name: Adjustable Fast Forward
author: YukkuriC
description: Faster! Now you can adjust how fast the 'fast forward' button is.
description_long: Faster! Now you can adjust how fast the 'fast forward' button is. The new option is in Gameplay(CLARITY) menu. The speed-up factor can go from x2 to x30+ fast, or even as slow as x0.2; default is x3, same as original game.
